reviews.review_msg: He's a great prof, well knowledgable in his area, but you have to work hard in his class. He was always around for any extra help and is a reasonable marker. If you want easy marks, avoid his class, but if you want a rewarding class then I would recommend him.

agree with all comments -- he's the best prof I've had at SFU and he's pushed me the hardest to produce good work.  If you'r looking for an easy credit, though, you'll get frustrated. Easy on the eyes but NOT on the marking!
